docs.title: Boiler SnapDocs
docs.text: Welcome to the SnapLabs Boiler Documentation – your field-smart guide to understanding, treating, and optimizing low-pressure steam boilers.

docs.title: Boiler Ratings
docs.text: Understand the difference between 'From and At', Boiler Horsepower (BHP), and kW ratings.

docs.title: Calculators & SnapTools
docs.text: Dosing calculators, steam output estimators, and SnapPrecise modules go here.

docs.title: SnapTruths
docs.text: Field puzzles and real-world challenges with interactive logic.

docs.title: System Components
docs.text: Explore boiler system components such as feedwater tanks, blowdown valves, and sensors.

docs.title: Water Treatment Chemistry
docs.text: Nitrite, sulfite, phosphate, and amine – explained for field reps and operators.
